mapper.insert: insert into user(u_id, u_pw, u_email, u_nick, u_type) values(#{u_id}, #{u_pw}, #{u_email}, #{u_nick}, #{u_type})
mapper.select: select u.u_id as follower, u.u_nick, i.u_path, i.u_image, (select count(*) from follow f1 where f1.f_passiveUser = follower) as followerCount from user u inner join u_imgupload i on i.u_id = u.u_id where u.u_type = 'a' order by u.u_nick

select u.u_id as follower, u.u_nick, i.u_path, i.u_image, (select count(*) from follow f1 where f1.f_passiveUser = follower) as followerCount, (select count(*) from follow where u_id = #{u_id} and f_passiveUser = follower) as isFollow from user u inner join u_imgupload i on i.u_id = u.u_id where u.u_type = 'a' order by u.u_nick

select u.u_id as follower, u.u_nick, i.u_path, i.u_image, (select count(*) from follow f1 where f1.f_passiveUser = follower) as followerCount from user u inner join u_imgupload i on i.u_id = u.u_id where u.u_type = 'a' order by followerCount desc;
